trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around November 17th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I was Just curious to see what I would get
divs: Sighting DetailsAll this started when a good friend of mine who lives in Beaverton Oregon filmed a slow moving ball like object in the sky one day. His video has been sent in and is being investigated. So I was watching other videos on youtube when I noticed something very odd. Today was a somewhat nice day here in oregon so I decided to get my camera and just start filming the sky. After I downloaded the video to my computer and played it back I did not see anything, but when I slowed it down I saw the same teardrop like objects that are seen in other videos traveling from the sky to the earth, and from the earth to the sky. The video I have attached was taken on my back porch facing south east it was around 2:30 pm.When I started filming I saw nothing in the sky at first then towards the end of the video a bird did fly by. After I slowed down the video I first thought what I was seeing was just glitches of some sort, but when I paused and played the video I could see the teardrop like objects. I am really amazed of what I cought on video. I am still excited about it. next spring and summer I plan on doing more filming of the skies.
